title: Impact of ONDC on Small Retailers in India
problem_statement: This research explores how the Open Network for Digital Commerce (ONDC) affects small retailers in India, focusing on adoption challenges and business opportunities.
key_questions: What are the main benefits of ONDC for small retailers?
What challenges do small retailers face in implementing ONDC?
How does ONDC influence competition with larger e-commerce platforms?
method_brief: Review government documentation and ONDC guidelines.
Survey small retailers across multiple regions in India.
Analyze case studies of early adopters.
Compare sales and customer engagement before and after ONDC adoption.
deliverables: Recommendations for small retailers to adopt ONDC effectively.
Visual charts showing adoption impact metrics.
